properties.description: this is connection to key vault

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		countryname as string,
		countrycode as string,
		date as string,
		c1_school_closing as string,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		c2_workplace_closing as string,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		c3_cancel_public_events as string,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as string,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c5_close_public_transport as string,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as string,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as string,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c8_international_travel_controls as string,
		e1_income_support as string,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as string,
		e3_fiscal_measures as string,
		e4_international_support as string,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as string,
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h2_testing_policy as string,
		h3_contact_tracing as string,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as string,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as string,
		m1_wildcard as string,
		confirmedcases as string,
		confirmeddeaths as string,
		stringencyindex as string,
		stringencyindexfordisplay as string,
		legacystringencyindex as string,
		legacystringencyindexfordisplay as string,
		iso_country as string,
		load_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> cosmosdb
cosmosdb derive(SourceSystem = 'CosmosDB') ~> SourceSystem
SourceSystem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['covid19cosmosdb.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> datalake

parameters{
	ContainerName as string ('raw'),
	FolderName as string ('CosmosDB_SingleFile')
}
source(output(
		SourceSystem as string,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		c1_school_closing as short,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		c2_workplace_closing as short,
		c3_cancel_public_events as short,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as short,
		c5_close_public_transport as short,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as short,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as short,
		c8_international_travel_controls as short,
		confirmedcases as short,
		confirmeddeaths as short,
		countrycode as string,
		countryname as string,
		date as string,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		e1_income_support as short,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as short,
		e3_fiscal_measures as integer,
		e4_international_support as double,
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as short,
		h2_testing_policy as short,
		h3_contact_tracing as short,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as integer,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as boolean,
		iso_country as string,
		load_date as string,
		stringencyindex as double,
		stringencyindexfordisplay as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: [($FolderName),('Archive/' + $FolderName)],
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[($FolderName)]) ~> ADLSCosmosDB
ADLSCosmosDB sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AzureSynapse

source(output(
		CountryCode as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> StageCountry
source(output(
		CountryCode as string,
		Country as string,
		HashValue as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCountry
StageCountry derive(HashValue = sha1(Country)) ~> CreatingHash
CreatingHash, DimCountry exists(CreatingHash@HashValue == DimCountry@HashValue,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, DimCountry lookup(StageCountry@Country == DimCountry@Country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GrabAllColumns
AddingTimestamp select(mapColumn(
		Country = StageCountry@Country,
		CountryCode = StageCountry@CountryCode,
		HashValue = CreatingHash@HashValue,
		InsertedDate = inserted_date,
		UpdatedDate = updated_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectingAllColumns
GrabAllColumns derive(inserted_date = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),fromUTC(currentTimestamp(),'PST'),InsertedDate),
		updated_date = iif(isNull(UpdatedDate),fromUTC(currentTimestamp(),'PST'),UpdatedDate)) ~> AddingTimestamp
SelectingAllColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Country'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		Country,
		CountryCode,
		HashValue,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCountryDestination

source(output(
		DateKey as integer,
		FullDate as date,
		isWeekDay as boolean,
		DayOfWeek as integer,
		DayOfMonth as integer,
		DayOfQuarter as integer,
		DayOfYear as integer,
		DayName as string,
		WeekOfYear as integer,
		WeekName as string,
		MonthOfYear as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		CalendarQuarter as integer,
		CalendarQuarterName as string,
		CalendarYear as integer,
		FiscalMonth as integer,
		FiscalMonthName as string,
		FiscalQuarter as integer,
		FiscalQuarterName as string,
		FiscalYear as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> StageDate
source(output(
		DateKey as integer,
		FullDate as date,
		isWeekDay as boolean,
		DayOfWeek as integer,
		DayOfMonth as integer,
		DayOfQuarter as integer,
		DayOfYear as integer,
		DayName as string,
		WeekOfYear as integer,
		WeekName as string,
		MonthOfYear as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		CalendarQuarter as integer,
		CalendarQuarterName as string,
		CalendarYear as integer,
		FiscalMonth as integer,
		FiscalMonthName as string,
		FiscalQuarter as integer,
		FiscalQuarterName as string,
		FiscalYear as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimDate
Exists alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
StageDate, DimDate exists(StageDate@DateKey == DimDate@DateKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['DateKey'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimDateDest

source(output(
		ISO_Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		CountryName as string,
		Date_Recorded as date,
		confirmedcases as integer,
		confirmeddeaths as integer,
		StringencyIndex as double,
		StringencyIndexForDisplay as double,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		school_closing as integer,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		Workplace_closing as integer,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		cancel_public_events as integer,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as integer,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c5_close_public_transport as integer,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as integer,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as integer,
		c8_international_travel_controls as integer,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		e1_income_support as integer,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as integer,
		e3_fiscal_measures as integer,
		e4_international_support as decimal(19,4),
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as integer,
		h2_testing_policy as integer,
		h3_contact_tracing as integer,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as integer,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> StagePolicies
source(output(
		PolicyID as integer,
		ISO_Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		CountryName as string,
		Date_Recorded as date,
		confirmedcases as integer,
		confirmeddeaths as integer,
		StringencyIndex as double,
		StringencyIndexForDisplay as double,
		c1_flag as boolean,
		school_closing as integer,
		c2_flag as boolean,
		Workplace_closing as integer,
		c3_flag as boolean,
		cancel_public_events as integer,
		c4_flag as boolean,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings as integer,
		c5_flag as boolean,
		c5_close_public_transport as integer,
		c6_flag as boolean,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements as integer,
		c7_flag as boolean,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement as integer,
		c8_international_travel_controls as integer,
		e1_flag as boolean,
		e1_income_support as integer,
		{e2_debt/contract_relief} as integer,
		e3_fiscal_measures as integer,
		e4_international_support as decimal(19,4),
		h1_flag as boolean,
		h1_public_information_campaigns as integer,
		h2_testing_policy as integer,
		h3_contact_tracing as integer,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare as integer,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines as integer,
		HashValue as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimPolicies
SurrogateKey derive(HashValue = sha1(CountryCode+CountryName+toString(Date_Recorded))) ~> CreatingHash
CreatingHash, DimPolicies exists(CreatingHash@HashValue == DimPolicies@HashValue,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, DimPolicies lookup(concat(StagePolicies@CountryCode,'_',StagePolicies@CountryName,'_',toString(StagePolicies@Date_Recorded)) == concat(DimPolicies@CountryCode,'_',DimPolicies@CountryName,'_',toString(DimPolicies@Date_Recorded)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GrabAllColumns
AddingTimestamp select(mapColumn(
		PolicyID = NewPolicyID,
		ISO_Country = StagePolicies@ISO_Country,
		CountryCode = StagePolicies@CountryCode,
		CountryName = StagePolicies@CountryName,
		Date_Recorded = StagePolicies@Date_Recorded,
		confirmedcases = StagePolicies@confirmedcases,
		confirmeddeaths = StagePolicies@confirmeddeaths,
		StringencyIndex = StagePolicies@StringencyIndex,
		StringencyIndexForDisplay = StagePolicies@StringencyIndexForDisplay,
		c1_flag = StagePolicies@c1_flag,
		school_closing = StagePolicies@school_closing,
		c2_flag = StagePolicies@c2_flag,
		Workplace_closing = StagePolicies@Workplace_closing,
		c3_flag = StagePolicies@c3_flag,
		cancel_public_events = StagePolicies@cancel_public_events,
		c4_flag = StagePolicies@c4_flag,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings = StagePolicies@c4_restrictions_on_gatherings,
		c5_flag = StagePolicies@c5_flag,
		c5_close_public_transport = StagePolicies@c5_close_public_transport,
		c6_flag = StagePolicies@c6_flag,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements = StagePolicies@c6_stay_at_home_requirements,
		c7_flag = StagePolicies@c7_flag,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement = StagePolicies@c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement,
		c8_international_travel_controls = StagePolicies@c8_international_travel_controls,
		e1_flag = StagePolicies@e1_flag,
		e1_income_support = StagePolicies@e1_income_support,
		e3_fiscal_measures = StagePolicies@e3_fiscal_measures,
		e4_international_support = StagePolicies@e4_international_support,
		h1_flag = StagePolicies@h1_flag,
		h1_public_information_campaigns = StagePolicies@h1_public_information_campaigns,
		h2_testing_policy = StagePolicies@h2_testing_policy,
		h3_contact_tracing = StagePolicies@h3_contact_tracing,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare = StagePolicies@h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines = StagePolicies@h5_investment_in_vaccines,
		updateddate = updated_date,
		inserteddate = inserted_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectingAllColumns
GrabAllColumns derive(inserted_date = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),fromUTC(currentTimestamp(),'PST'),InsertedDate),
		updated_date = iif(isNull(UpdatedDate),fromUTC(currentTimestamp(),'PST'),UpdatedDate)) ~> AddingTimestamp
SelectingAllColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
StagePolicies keyGenerate(output(NewPolicyID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['PolicyID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PolicyID,
		ISO_Country,
		CountryCode,
		CountryName,
		Date_Recorded,
		confirmedcases,
		confirmeddeaths,
		StringencyIndex,
		StringencyIndexForDisplay,
		c1_flag,
		school_closing,
		c2_flag,
		Workplace_closing,
		c3_flag,
		cancel_public_events,
		c4_flag,
		c4_restrictions_on_gatherings,
		c5_flag,
		c5_close_public_transport,
		c6_flag,
		c6_stay_at_home_requirements,
		c7_flag,
		c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement,
		c8_international_travel_controls,
		e1_flag,
		e1_income_support,
		e3_fiscal_measures,
		e4_international_support,
		h1_flag,
		h1_public_information_campaigns,
		h2_testing_policy,
		h3_contact_tracing,
		h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare,
		h5_investment_in_vaccines,
		UpdatedDate = updateddate,
		InsertedDate = inserteddate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimPoliciesDestination
